configuration.title: Сканер
configuration.configContainer:
<config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="../../../../../../target/classes/advimport/schema1.xsd" save-log="true" threads-number="1"> <mode>CREATE</mode> <mode>UPDATE</mode> <gui-parameter name="fileCI" type="FILE" title="Выберите файл (CSV)"/>
<!-- Задает метакласс импортируемых объектов --> <parameter name="CIMetaClass">objectBase$Scanner</parameter> <parameter name="CIIdHolder">idHolder</parameter>
<!-- Импорт ИТ-активов --> <class name="Scanner" threads-number="1"> <parameter name="metaClass">${CIMetaClass}</parameter>
<csv-data-source with-header="true" file-name="${fileCI}" delimiter=";" encoding="CP1251" id-column="id"> <column name="id" src-key="UUID"/> <column name="serialNumber" src-key="serialNumber"/> <column name="inventoryNumber" src-key="inventoryNumber"/> <column name="Price" src-key="Price"/> <column name="producer" src-key="Producer"/> <column name="model" src-key="Model"/> <column name="power" src-key="Power"/> <column name="description" src-key="Description"/> <column name="mass" src-key="mass"/> <column name="printerType" src-key="printerType"/> <column name="wifi" src-key="wifi"/> <column name="color" src-key="color"/> </csv-data-source>
<constant-metaclass-resolver/> <object-searcher attr="${CIIdHolder}"/>
<attr name="${CIIdHolder}" column="id"/> <attr name="serialNumber" column="serialNumber"/> <attr name="inventoryNumbe" column="inventoryNumber"/> <attr name="Price" column="Price"/> <attr name="producer" column="producer"/> <attr name="model" column="model"/> <attr name="power" column="power"/> <attr name="description" column="description"/> <attr name="mass" column="mass"/> <attr name="printerType" column="printerType"/> <attr name="color" column="color"/> </class> </config>
